questions.question: What is the primary function of a Rectangular Pulse Current Generator?

answers.b: To provide a constant DC voltage
answers.c: To produce rectangular current pulses for testing applications

questions.question: Which component is crucial for shaping the pulse in a Rectangular Pulse Current Generator?
The pulse width of a Rectangular Pulse Current Generator is primarily controlled by:

answers.a: The amplitude of the input signal
answers.c: The time constant of the circuit components
answers.d: The type of power supply used
